title: Coaches on the Hot Seat
itunes:title: Coaches on the Hot Seat
description:
A room filled with heroes -- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and NFL Now’s Colleen Wolfe -- react to the latest NFL news including Junior Galette being released by the Saints and Jermaine Gresham signing with the Cardinals (4:29). Then, the heroes breakdown which coaches are on the hot seat (28:10) before wrapping the show with the newest edition of “What’s More Likely?” (38:27).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
